name: As Long As Possible
description:
At the end, is death always the end ?

Definitely not in As Long As Possible, fight, die and fight again.

Rules
  • Last as long as possible while not being the last one standing.
  • Get killed to last longer.
  • Each time you resurrect, your power-ups are reset.
Power-Ups

 

When the player dies, respawns as the enemy who dealt the last hit

Heals enemies

Slows enemies

Speeds the player up

Controls
  • Move : WASD/Arrows
  • Attack : E

This game was created for the Black & White Jam #9 by Jim De Oliveira and Bernique.
